alert.note: Alert for Trousdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 3:02PM CDT until May 17 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL SMITH AND CENTRAL TROUSDALE COUNTIES... At 302 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hartsville to near Carthage to near Gordonsville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Hartsville, Gordonsville, Hickman, South Carthage and Dixon Springs. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 252 and 265. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
